briefTitle: Intensity Modulated Radiotherapy With Concomitant Boost in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Moderated Accelerated RAdiotherapy (MARA-2) in Moderate-high Risk Breast Cancer: a Phase I-II Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Incidence of treatment.related late adverse events
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* histologically confirmed invasive breast cancer (pT1-4) with at least one of these characteristics: 3 or more metastatic axillary nodes, pre or peri-menopausal status, close resection margins
* breast conservative surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* positive margins
* distant metastases
